message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to start.  What do you say?
Your turn, Alice. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  Consider that the value of the money decreases for you with each round.
Bob, this is getting silly. The money is losing value for me with each round. I'll be generous and offer you 4800 while I take 5200. Take it before it shrinks further!
